sub_title: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher
summary: Schoolsupport4afghanistan was an Afghan-Dutch foundation which was active in the reconstruction of education in Afghanistan. Within our possibilities we where helping schools with rebuilding the classrooms,buying equipment, machines and tools.We installed all the machines and we teach the teachers how to use them.

school.name: Teachers Training Practical Mechanical Engineering Rotterdam
Teachers Training Theoretical Mechanical Engineering Amsterdam

projects.title: Afghanistan Mazar-e-Sharif
projects.description:
A German friend asked me to come to Mazar-e-Sharif to help him with an education project.
I have visit several associations in Mazar - e - Sharif with the help of Schoolsupport4afghanistan.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan Kabul
projects.description:
When the two containers with machines and equipment arrived in Afghanistan ,I went back to Kabul. 
With Schoolsupport4afghanistan we have brought Electrical and Automotive equipment and installed Metall Working Machines in Kabul Auto Mechanical Institute in Chelseton - Jangalak - Kabul.
After installing the Metall Machines we have trained the teachers how to work safe with these equipment. The new classrooms have been opened by Deputy Minister Mr. Asif Nang.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan Takhta Pul
projects.description: I have given an Training for 18 teachers in the subject of Drawing on the Technical School in Takhta Pul.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan Takhta Pul
projects.description: I have been working on a Technical School in Takhta Pul. This on the road from Mazar-e-Sharif to Balkh.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan - Bamiyan
projects.description:
We from Schoolsupport have brought two containers with machines and equipment for the departments, Auto-Motive, Carpentary, Electrical and Metall working.
We have installed the workshops for Electrical and Metall working. 
I have visit our Project schools from 2009 (Technic Sanawi) and 2012 (Auto Mechanical) in Kabul and have written an evaluation report.
I also visit the Technical School in Maidan Wardak Province and did a survey about this School.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Maidan Wardak
projects.description:
In this totall empty nice school building we have installed machines and equipment for the departments of 
Auto-Motive, Electrical, Carpentary and Metall working machines.
I have trained the teachers theoretical and practical how to use the Metall machines in a safe way and how to maintenance the machines. The workshops and classrooms where opened by the Governor Mr. Hayatullah Hayat.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Maidan Wardak
projects.description: On behalf of TVET I visit the Technical School in Maidan Wardak to see what I could do with our foundation for this school. In Kabul I visit our project schools and made an evaluation report for our donors in The Netherlands.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul
projects.description:
I was in Kabul waiting for our containers with machines and equipment, but they did not arrive. In the meanwhile I arranged some other meetings and actions.I visit the technical schools such as TTTA, Kabul Mechanical Institute, Kabul-Auto-Mechanical-Institute and Technic Sanawi.
I also had some meetings in TVET with the Deputy Minister Asif Nang.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-The Netherlands
projects.description: On behalf of the University of Wageningen and the Ministry of Education and Agriculture I have guided a group of 4 people of TVET Afghanistan and lead them round in The Netherlands, visit our ROC in Terneuzen, Ministries of Foreign Affairs and Embassy of Afghanistan in The Hague.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan Kabul
projects.description:
On behalf of the German foundation GTZ, I have given a Summer Workshop Teacher Training in Kabul Mechanical Institute, which included theoretical and practical technology for machining.
I have also visit the local Industry in Kabul regarding to internship and students placements.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan Kabul
projects.description:
With Schoolsupport4afghanistan we have installed Metall Working Machines in Technic Sanawi (AIT)  Karte -  Char - Kabul . After installing all the machines and equipment we have trained the teachers.
The new workshops has been opened by the Minister of Education dear Mr. Wardak.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul
projects.description:
I visit Mechanici in Do-Sham-Shera,Technic Sanawi (AIT) and TVET in Kabul.
I have had several meetings with Eng.Qayum Salim the Deputy Minister of Technical&Vocational Education in Kabul.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-The Netherlands
projects.description: With Schoolsupport4afghanistan we have collect money with the help of our donors and I have bought machines and equipment, and send this in two containers to Afghanistan

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-The Hague in The Netherlands
projects.description: I was invited for a meeting with the Dutch Minister of Education dear Mr.R.Plasterk and the Afghan Minister dear Mr.Haneef Atmar in the Ministry of Education in The Hague. After this we have had an meeting in the Ministery of Foreign Affairs about cooperation and help from the Dutch government to Afghanistan.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul
projects.description: On behalf of the Ministry of Education in Kabul ,I have given a Theoretical and Practical Training for Technical teachers in Kabul. I brought technical books from the Netherlands and bought technical tools for the different departments of Mechanici in Kabul. In these period I have visit several schools in Kabul while the students where busy to make their exams.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul
projects.description: On behalf of the  Ministry of Education in Kabul ,I have given a Theoretical and Practical Training for Technical teachers in Kabul and visit several Technical and Vocational schools in Kabul.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-The Hague in The Netherlands
projects.description:
I have lead an Education delegation of 6 people from Afghanistan 10 days round in The Netherlands.
We visit several schools,NGO's , Ministries and firms of Mechanical Engineering with the support of Ministry of Education and Agriculture , and University of Wageningen.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul-Jalalabad-Poli-e-Khomri
projects.description:
Visiting several meetings from the Education Council in the Ministry of Education in Kabul.
I have made a visit for the second time to the Fatima Zuhra school and helped them again with buying chairs and carpets and school equipment. I have visit The Dutch PRT in Pol-e-Khomri. On behalf of The Ministry of Education I did a survey about Technical and Vocational Education in Kabul and Jalalabad.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-The Netherlands
projects.description: In cooperation with the University of Delft and Cordaid, I have send technical equipment for a Technical School in Jalalabad. Including two Lathes, two complete toolboxes and Technical Books.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

projects.title: Afghanistan-Kabul-Jalalabad-Pansjir Valley
projects.description:
I have visit and helped the girl school Fatima Zuhra just outside Jalalabad.
On request from ISAF I visit the Technical School (Mechaniki) in Do- Sham- Shera - Kabul.
I have also visit Panshir Valley, the Technical School in Jalalabad, The Pedagogy Training in Jalalabad  and The Engineering Faculty of Nangarhar University.

contributors.headline: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher

profile_positions.description:
In Afghanistan heb ik via contacten zoals het Ministerie van Onderwijs nieuwe (school) projecten gevonden, welke wij als schoolsupport hebben uitgevoerd.
Hiervoor heb ik lezingen gegeven, waardoor er extra gelden binnen kwamen. Verder heb ik project plannen geschreven om donateurs enthousiast te maken om onze projecten te steunen. Verder heb ik het transport geregeld van containers met equipment, machines enz.
In Kabul ,Jalalabad , Maidan Wardak en Bamiyan hebben we de containers zelf ontvangen en de machines in de school lokalen geplaatst, opgebouwd en aangesloten. Daarna heb ik de docenten getraind om met de machines op de juiste wijze om te gaan.
profile_positions.title: Chairman

profile_positions.description: Bij Scalda was ik docent Werktuigbouwkunde en actief als stage begeleider voor leerlingen Werktuigbouwkunde en later voor de leerlingen van de opleiding Maintenance. Ik ben ook actief geweest in de MR en later ook in de OR van Scalda. Sinds 30 augustus 2018 heb ik Scalda verlaten wegens de pensioen gerechtigde leeftijd.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Mechanical Engineering

company.name: NGO- ACRA (General Coordination Board of Afghans in The Netherlands)

profile_positions.company: NGO- ACRA (General Coordination Board of Afghans in The Netherlands)
profile_positions.description:
Bij de NGO -ACRA was ik mede oprichter en was secretaris en penning meester.
Na 2006 hebben we met een nieuw bestuur de naam verandert in Schoolsupport4afghanistan, omdat dat beter paste bij het werk wat we in Afghanistan deden.
profile_positions.title: Member of the board

profile_positions.location: Bergen Op Zoom en omgeving, Nederland
profile_positions.description: Bij de Holland was ik tekenaar constructeur voor zowel gietwerk als machinebouw.
profile_positions.title: Engineer

profile_positions.description: Bij Fluor was ik Piping tekenaar voor de petrochemische industrie.
profile_positions.title: Piping Engineer
